abbr.desc: Alternative label to use for the header cell when referencing the cell in other contexts
abbr.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

accept.desc: Hint for expected file type in file upload controls
accept.value_type: Set of comma-separated tokens* consisting of valid MIME type strings with no parameters or audio/*, video/*, or image/. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

accept-charset.desc: Character encodings to use for form submission

accesskey.desc: Keyboard shortcut to activate or focus element
accesskey.value_type: Ordered set of unique space-separated tokens, case-sensitive, consisting of one code point in length

action.desc: URL to use for form submission
action.value_type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

allow.desc: Feature policy to be applied to the iframe's contents

allowfullscreen.desc: Whether to allow the iframe's contents to use requestFullscreen()

allowpaymentrequest.desc: Whether the iframe's contents are allowed to use the PaymentRequest interface to make payment requests

alt.desc: Replacement text for use when images are not available
alt.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

as.desc: Potential destination for a preload request (for rel="preload" and rel="modulepreload")
as.value_type: Potential destination, for rel="preload"; script-like destination, for rel="modulepreload"

async.desc: Execute script when available, without blocking while fetching

autocapitalize.desc: Recommended autocapitalization behavior (for supported input methods)

autocomplete.desc: Default setting for autofill feature for controls in the form. Hint for form autofill feature
autocomplete.value_type: Keywords. Autofill field name and related tokens. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

autofocus.desc: Automatically focus the form control when the page is loaded

autoplay.desc: Hint that the media resource can be started automatically when the page is loaded

cite.desc: Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
cite.value_type: Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces

class.desc: Classes to which the element belongs

color.desc: Color to use when customizing a site's icon (for rel="mask-icon")

cols.desc: Maximum number of characters per line
cols.value_type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

colspan.desc: Number of columns that the cell is to span
colspan.value_type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

content.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

coords.desc: Coordinates for the shape to be created in an image map
coords.value_type: Valid list of floating-point numbers. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

crossorigin.desc: How the element handles crossorigin requests

data.value_type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

datetime.desc: Date and (optionally) time of the change. Machine-readable value
datetime.value_type: Valid date string with optional time. Valid month string, valid date string, valid yearless date string, valid time string, valid local date and time string, valid time-zone offset string, valid global date and time string, valid week string, valid non-negative integer, or valid duration string

decoding.desc: Decoding hint to use when processing this image for presentation

default.desc: Enable the track if no other text track is more suitable

dir.desc: The text directionality of the element. The text directionality of the element

dirname.desc: Name of form control to use for sending the element's directionality in form submission
dirname.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

disabled.desc:
Whether the form control is disabled. Trigger "formDisabledCallback" reaction, and
          disable form submission for the element's data.. Whether the descendant form controls, except any inside legend, are disabled
disabled.value_type: Boolean attribute. Boolean attribute. Boolean attribute

download.desc: Whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its file name if so

enctype.desc: Entry list encoding type to use for form submission

enterkeyhint.desc: Hint for selecting an enter key action

for.desc: Associate the label with form control. Specifies controls from which the output was calculated
for.value_type: ID. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated. Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, case-sensitive, consisting of IDs. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

form.desc: Associates the element with a form element
form.value_type: ID. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

formaction.desc: URL to use for form submission
formaction.value_type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

formenctype.desc: Entry list encoding type to use for form submission

formmethod.desc: Variant to use for form submission

formnovalidate.desc: Bypass form control validation for form submission

formtarget.value_type: Valid browsing context name or keyword

headers.desc: The header cells for this cell
headers.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, case-sensitive, consisting of IDs. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

high.value_type: Valid floating-point number. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

href.desc: Address of the hyperlink. Address of the hyperlink. Document base URL
href.value_type: Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces. Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces. Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces

id.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

imagesizes.desc: Image sizes for different page layouts

imagesrcset.desc: Images to use in different situations (e.g., high-resolution displays, small monitors, etc.)
imagesrcset.value_type: Comma-separated list of image candidate strings

inputmode.desc: Hint for selecting an input modality

integrity.desc: Integrity metadata used in Subresource Integrity checks [SRI]

is.value_type: Valid custom element name of a defined customized built-in element

ismap.desc: Whether the image is a server-side image map

itemid.desc: Global identifier for a microdata item
itemid.value_type: Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces

itemprop.desc: Property names of a microdata item
itemprop.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, case-sensitive, consisting of valid absolute URLs, defined property names, or text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

itemref.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, case-sensitive, consisting of IDs. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

itemtype.desc: Item types of a microdata item
itemtype.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, case-sensitive, consisting of valid absolute URL. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

lang.value_type: Valid BCP 47 language tag or the empty string

list.value_type: ID. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

loop.desc: Whether to loop the media resource

low.value_type: Valid floating-point number. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

manifest.value_type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

max.desc: Maximum value. Upper bound of range
max.value_type: Varies. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated. Valid floating-point number. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

method.desc: Variant to use for form submission

min.desc: Minimum value. Lower bound of range
min.value_type: Varies. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated. Valid floating-point number. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

muted.desc: Whether to mute the media resource by default

name.desc: Name of the element to use for form submission and in the form.elements API. Name of form to use in the document.forms API. Name of nested browsing context. Name of image map to reference from the usemap attribute. Metadata name. Name of parameter. Name of shadow tree slot
name.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated. Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated. Valid browsing context name or keyword. Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated. Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated. Text. Text

nomodule.desc: Prevents execution in user agents that support module scripts

nonce.desc: Cryptographic nonce used in Content Security Policy checks [CSP]

novalidate.desc: Bypass form control validation for form submission

open.desc: Whether the details are visible. Whether the dialog box is showing

optimum.value_type: Valid floating-point number. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

pattern.desc: Pattern to be matched by the form control's value
pattern.value_type: Regular expression matching the JavaScript Pattern production

ping.value_type: Set of space-separated tokens consisting of valid non-empty URLs

placeholder.desc: User-visible label to be placed within the form control
placeholder.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

playsinline.desc: Encourage the user agent to display video content within the element's playback area

poster.desc: Poster frame to show prior to video playback
poster.value_type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

preload.desc: Hints how much buffering the media resource will likely need

readonly.desc: Whether to allow the value to be edited by the user. Affects willValidate

referrerpolicy.desc: Referrer policy for fetches initiated by the element

rel.desc: Relationship between the location in the document containing the hyperlink and the destination resource. Relationship between the document containing the hyperlink and the destination resource
rel.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated. Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

required.desc: Whether the control is required for form submission

rows.value_type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

rowspan.desc: Number of rows that the cell is to span

sandbox.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, ASCII case-insensitive, consisting of "allow-forms", "allow-modals", "allow-orientation-lock", "allow-pointer-lock", "allow-popups", "allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox", "allow-presentation", "allow-same-origin", "allow-scripts" and "allow-top-navigation"

scope.desc: Specifies which cells the header cell applies to

selected.desc: Whether the option is selected by default

shape.desc: The kind of shape to be created in an image map

size.value_type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

sizes.desc: Sizes of the icons (for rel="icon"). Image sizes for different page layouts
sizes.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, ASCII case-insensitive, consisting of sizes. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated. Valid source size list

span.desc: Number of columns spanned by the element
span.value_type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

spellcheck.desc: Whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked

src.value_type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

srcdoc.desc: A document to render in the iframe
srcdoc.value_type: The source of an iframe srcdoc document. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

srcset.desc: Images to use in different situations (e.g., high-resolution displays, small monitors, etc.)
srcset.value_type: Comma-separated list of image candidate strings

step.desc: Granularity to be matched by the form control's value
step.value_type: Valid floating-point number greater than zero, or "any"

style.value_type: CSS declarations. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

tabindex.desc: Whether the element is focusable, and the relative order of the element for the purposes of sequential focus navigation

target.desc: Browsing context for hyperlink navigation. Default browsing context for hyperlink navigation and form submission. Browsing context for form submission
target.value_type: Valid browsing context name or keyword. Valid browsing context name or keyword. Valid browsing context name or keyword

title.desc: Advisory information for the element. Full term or expansion of abbreviation. Description of pattern (when used with pattern attribute). Title of the link. CSS style sheet set name

translate.desc: Whether the element is to be translated when the page is localized

type.desc: Hint for the type of the referenced resource. Type of button. Type of embedded resource. Type of form control. Kind of list marker. Type of script. Type of form control
type.value_type: Valid MIME type string. Keywords. Valid MIME type string. input type keyword. Keywords. "module"; a valid MIME type string that is not a JavaScript MIME type essence match. An input type e.g. "text"

usemap.desc: Name of image map to use
usemap.value_type: Valid hash-name reference. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

value.desc: Value to be used for form submission. Machine-readable value. Value of the form control. Ordinal value of the list item. Current value of the element. Value of parameter
value.value_type: Text. Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated. Varies. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated. Valid integer. Valid floating-point number. Text

wrap.desc: How the value of the form control is to be wrapped for form submission
